description: During my internship at Helios P2P, I contributed to the development of customer-facing applications with a strong focus on both frontend and backend functionality. My key responsibilities included implementing a signup page for AFC customers, building OTP verification workflows, and addressing real-world product issues through Jira-based task management.

At Cogniata, I contributed to the development of Microsoft Azure cloud-based applications, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to create innovative solutions. One of my key accomplishments was designing and implementing an AI-driven Financial Research Assistant. This solution empowers users to query financial reports stored in Azure Blob Storage and receive accurate, context-aware responses.
